TopicTitle: Any good KSP tutorials that apply to today?

Articles.Content:
I just started playing yesterday due to the sale going on in KSP, and I have little to no idea what is going on

A lot of the good tutorials (and the training scenarios in KSP) are made from pretty long ago, so I was wondering if there is some tutorials that will apply well to the current version of KSP

This is the one that got me playing.

Can't guarantee that it's for the most up to date version, but I'm running the current version, and never had a conflict.
Pretty much everything that was released after second half of 2015 should be accurate enough. May be missing some features but the general idea or game behavior hasn't changed much since then.

Play the in game tutorials, but install this first.

 

Edited May 1, 2022 by MechBFP
